properties.description: Quick access to the panel structure nodes references
properties.name: _refs

properties.description: Indicates the vc-scroll whether it needs arrow scrolls or not         Values true, false         Default: false
properties.name: arrowScrolls

properties.description: Indicates whether the vc-scroll will autofill its container or grow according to its content until it fills its container         Values true, false         Default: false
properties.name: fit

properties.description: In case of being used in vc-tabs it will be used internally to link a tab to its panel
properties.name: name

properties.description: In case of being used in vc-tabs , it will be used as a visual text for the tab
properties.name: tabTitle

methods.description: Append content to the panel or the scroll container if exists
methods.name: appendContent

params.description: Node element containing the panel content
params.name: dataNode

methods.description: Set panel content form local or remote html
methods.name: importContent

methods.description: Remove current content and re-import content
methods.name: refresh

methods.description: Extract content and remove the template node
methods.name: removeTemplate

params.description: Node element containing the panel content
params.name: tmp

methods.description: Extract content from template and remove it from DOM
methods.name: render
